message.name: ERR_REMOVE_ATTENDEE_CANCELLED_MEETING
message.locale: An attendee can not be removed from a cancelled meeting.

message.name: ERR_REMOVE_ATTENDEE_NOT_ORGANIZER
message.locale: Only the meeting organizer can remove attendees from a meeting.
Only the meeting organiser can remove attendees from a meeting.

message.name: ERR_REMOVE_ORGANIZER_FROM_MEETING
message.locale: The meeting organizer can not be removed from the meeting attendee list.
The meeting organiser can not be removed from the meeting attendee list.

message.name: ERR_MODIFY_CANCELLED_MEETING
message.locale: A cancelled meeting can not be modified.

message.name: ERR_INVITE_ATTENDEE_CANCELLED_MEETING
message.locale: An attendee can not be invited to a cancelled meeting.

message.name: ERR_INVITE_ATTENDEE_NOT_ORGANIZER
message.locale: Only the meeting organizer can invite attendees to a meeting.
Only the meeting organiser can invite attendees to a meeting.

message.name: ERR_INVITE_ATTENDEE_ALREADY_EXISTS
message.locale: The attendee '%1s' has already been invited to this meeting.

message.name: ERR_ATTENDEE_RELATEDID_NOT_SPECIFIED
message.locale: The attendee related ID has not been specified.

message.name: ERR_CANCEL_CANCELLED_MEETING
message.locale: A cancelled meeting can not be cancelled.

message.name: ERR_MINUTES_ISSUED_CANNOT_CANCEL_MEETING
message.locale: '%1s' meeting cannot be cancelled as the minutes have been issued for this meeting.

message.name: ERR_MINUTES_EXIST_FOR_CANCELLED_MEETING
message.locale: '%1s' meeting minutes exist for this cancelled meeting, please delete these meeting minutes.

message.name: ERR_CANCEL_MEETING_NOT_ORGANIZER
message.locale: Only the meeting organizer can cancel a meeting.
Only the meeting organiser can cancel a meeting.

message.name: ERR_ATTENDEE_DETAILS_NOT_ENTERED
message.locale: Attendee details must be entered.

message.name: ERR_ATTENDEE_DETAILS_TOO_MANY_ENTERED
message.locale: Only one of client, case participant, registered person/user or email address may be entered.

message.name: INF_NO_EMAIL_ADDRESS_RECORDED
message.locale: no email address recorded

message.name: ERR_INVALID_ATTENDEE_EMAIL_ADDRESS
message.locale: '%1s' is not a valid email address. Valid email addresses must contain the @ character.

message.name: ERR_MEETINGS_FV_INVALID_ATTENDEE_TYPE
message.locale: The attendee you have chosen does not match the selected attendee type.
